originalText.text: As an art consultant and art collector I have enjoyed working with Sugarlift for the past two years.  Sugarlift provides a seamless digital experience for finding and purchasing artworks and their customer service is exceptional.  I love the group of artists they work with- from edgy photographers to beautiful abstract painters.  They also have a great selection of art priced under $1,000 and Sugarlift's selections work in a variety of spaces including residential and commercial projects.  They also host some great events where you can meet the artists or experience art in a fun and original while supporting great causes.

originalText.text: If you‚Äôre looking for some amazing contemporary art by super talented artists, Sugarlift is the place. They have an incredible roster of vetted artists who are creating beautiful, high quality work.   I recently purchased a painting from them and the process couldn‚Äôt have been easier.  The staff are wonderful  and very responsive. I will definitely make future purchases  from them and will recommend  them to family and friends without hesitation.

originalText.text:
Apart from having a great collection, they have provided us with the kind of service that exceeds all expectations. Having experienced an error on their database, then a small delay in sending us (in the UK) our selected work, they commissioned the artist to produce another work which we received recently - free of charge.
Packaging of both works was perfect, and we received constant updates from the magnificent Sylvie.
We will undoubtedly make use of Sugarlift again.

originalText.text: I find the Sugarlift platform very easy to use and love browsing through the artworks. I selected a piece that I absolutely love and am so excited to own. I had a few questions and the site was very responsive to my email, which I really appreciated.  Sugarlift also followed up immediately after the piece was delivered to make sure that it arrived in good condition (which it did). It was a great experience working with them and I hope to find more pieces for my collection!
